prompt:
A boldly alluring Korean woman in her 20s on an escalator near a subway exit, framed waist-up.
Pose: one hand gripping the rail, hips angled, torso twisted slightly as she turns back mid-ride.
Expression: unwavering direct gaze, half-lidded eyes, lips softly parted, no smile.
Outfit: fitted cotton jersey top + high-waist skirt, matte texture, natural wrinkles.
Lighting: mixed overhead station lights, smooth highlight roll-off.
Camera: 85mm f/1.8 handheld candid, shallow DOF. Film: Portra 400.
Exclude any readable signage/text/logos; background signs abstract and unreadable.
